comment._content: Presumably Frederick C. Tanner, who became chairman of the NY Republican State Committee in October, 1914: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_Republican_State_Committee

comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content: Frederick Chauncey Tanner (1878-1963) was chairman of the New York Republican State Committee in 1914-17, and a candidate for Congress in 1918.

comment.author: 97533501@N00
comment._content: Heh, your post slipped in while I was looking up the obituary...

comment._content: That's what you get for using original sources instead of Wikipedia.  :)
